We are launching a brand-new padel centre in Rochdale, and we're on the lookout for an energetic and proactive Facility Manager to lead operations from the ground up. This is an exciting opportunity to join one of the fastest-growing sports in the UK and play a key role in creating a vibrant and inclusive environment for our players and local community.
This is not your average club manager role. While your primary focus will be managing day-to-day padel operations, you will also provide light oversight (not direct management) of other businesses based within the wider facility. Your job is to keep the whole venue running smoothly and ensure an exceptional experience for everyone on site.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Facility Operations: Oversee the smooth running of padel courts and wider site operations, ensuring cleanliness, maintenance, and safety at all times.
  • Customer Experience: Be the face of the centre—create a welcoming, friendly environment for members and casual players.
  • Booking & Admin: Manage court bookings, staff rotas, customer communications, and Playtomic integration.

  • Support On-Site Businesses: Act as a point of contact for other businesses operating within the facility, escalating issues where needed.
  • Coach & Event Coordination: Work alongside coaches to ensure lesson coverage and help plan tournaments, social events, and community sessions.
  • Health & Safety: Lead site safety compliance, carry out risk assessments, and ensure first aid and emergency protocols are in place.
  • Marketing Support: Collaborate with the marketing team to help promote local events and initiatives.

You Should Have:
  • Prior experience in facility management, leisure operations, or sports venue management.
  • Great people skills—confident, approachable, and solution-focused.
  • Strong organisational ability with a keen eye for site standards and safety.
  • A good understanding of padel (or another racket sport).
  • Willingness to work flexible hours including evenings and weekends.
  • Confidence in using basic digital systems like booking software and WhatsApp for customer communication.

Bonus Points For:
  • Previous experience managing any Leisure facility , padel/tennis  would be a bonus
  • First Aid certificate (or willingness to undertake training).
  • Event or community engagement experience.
